name: Masseria Salamina
heroDescription: An ancient 17th-century Masseria immersed in the Apulian countryside among rows of almond and centuries-old olive trees. Experience the authentic charm of Puglia in a place of suggestive beauty, filled with Mediterranean scents of lavender and oregano.
intro: An ancient Masseria of the 1600s, immersed in the Apulian countryside among rows of almond and centuries-old olive trees, surrounded by Mediterranean scents of lavender and oregano. Imagine celebrating your most important day with the people you love in a place of suggestive beauty, with tables full of fresh and genuine products, prepared with wisdom and authenticity.

history.description: Masseria Salamina is a stunning 17th-century fortified farmhouse that has been lovingly restored to preserve its historical character while offering modern luxury. Built as a defensive agricultural estate, it has witnessed centuries of Puglian history and has evolved into one of the region's most exclusive wedding destinations.
history.artCollection: The Masseria showcases traditional Puglian architecture with thick stone walls, vaulted ceilings, and characteristic arches. Each space tells a story of the region's rich agricultural heritage.

spaces.name: Uliveto Secolare - Ancient Olive Grove
spaces.description: The magical centuries-old olive grove, illuminated in the evening, perfect for late afternoon ceremonies and receptions under the stars.

spaces.name: La Serra - The Greenhouse
spaces.description: A stunning modern glass conservatory offering an elegant indoor-outdoor dining experience with panoramic views.

spaces.name: La Corte Interna - Inner Court
spaces.description: The elegant inner courtyard, perfect for intimate dinners and grand receptions.

spaces.name: Sala Interna Grande - Large Indoor Dining Room
spaces.description: Spacious indoor dining room with impressive vaulted ceilings and grand fireplace.

spaces.name: Cortiletto della Cappella - Chapel Courtyard
spaces.description: Intimate courtyard perfect for romantic symbolic or civil ceremonies.

spaces.name: Cortile Bouganvillea - Bougainvillea Courtyard
spaces.description: Charming courtyard adorned with bougainvillea, ideal for late afternoon ceremonies.

spaces.name: Cortiletto Porta Carraia - Carriage Gate Courtyard
spaces.description: Historic entrance courtyard with original carriage gate, perfect for intimate gatherings.

spaces.name: Piazzale Ala Padronale - Manor House Courtyard
spaces.description: Grand courtyard in front of the manor house, ideal for evening receptions with beautiful illumination.

spaces.name: Patio Piscina - Pool Patio
spaces.description: Elegant poolside area with canopy for evening receptions and buffets.

spaces.name: Ulivo Piscina - Century-Old Olive Tree by Pool
spaces.description: Enchanting spot centered around an ancient olive tree, perfect for intimate ceremonies or romantic cake-cutting moments.

spaces.name: Saletta degli Archi - Arched Room
spaces.description: Intimate indoor space with charming stone arches and vaulted ceilings, ideal for intimate dinners or bar area.

ancillaryServices: Cooking classes with authentic Puglian recipes
Olive oil tastings from century-old groves
BBQ events in the olive grove
Gardening workshops in organic vegetable garden
outlets: Sala Interna Grande - Large Dining Room

facilities.name: Swimming Pool
facilities.description: Beautiful outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers, perfect for guest relaxation and daytime events.

facilities.name: Mediterranean Garden
facilities.description: Lush gardens filled with lavender, oregano, and other aromatic Mediterranean herbs.

facilities.name: Italian Garden
facilities.description: Formal Italian-style garden with manicured hedges and elegant landscaping.

facilities.name: Citrus Garden
facilities.description: Beautiful citrus grove with lemon and orange trees.

facilities.name: Organic Vegetable Garden
facilities.description: Working vegetable garden providing fresh produce for the kitchen.

facilities.name: Centuries-Old Olive Trees Grove
facilities.description: Magnificent ancient olive trees creating a magical setting for ceremonies and events.

details.name: Mezzanine Rooms
details.description: Charming rooms designed with a mezzanine level, offering flexible space for couples or small families.

details.name: Farm House Apartments
details.description: Spacious apartments reflecting traditional Puglian farmhouse style, perfect for guests seeking comfort and authenticity.

details.name: Manor's House Rooms
details.description: Elegant rooms in the main manor house, including Superior Double Rooms, Junior Suites, and Suite Superior options.

included: Use of all 20 rooms for 3 nights minimum
Access to gardens and olive groves
Flexible ceremony options (civil rite or symbolic ceremony)
exclusiveUseDetails.description: Experience complete privacy with exclusive use of Masseria Salamina. Accommodation for 40 or more people across 20 beautifully appointed rooms for a minimum stay of 3 nights. Access to all 11 unique event spaces, from the magical olive grove to the modern greenhouse, ensuring your celebration is truly one-of-a-kind.

faqs.q: What is the minimum stay for exclusive use?
faqs.a: 3 nights minimum stay is required for exclusive use events.

faqs.q: How many guests can be accommodated overnight?
faqs.a: Accommodation is available for 40 or more people across 20 rooms of 3 different types: Mezzanine rooms, Farm House apartments, and Manor's House rooms.
We offer both civil rite and symbolic ceremonies in various beautiful locations across the estate.

faqs.q: Can you accommodate different reception styles?
faqs.a: Yes, our team will work with you to choose the style and menu that best suits your wedding vision, from elegant plated dinners to traditional Puglian buffets.

faqs.q: What pre and post-wedding events can be organized?
faqs.a: We offer BBQ events, country chic picnics in the olive grove, Focaccia parties, pool parties, cooking classes, olive oil tastings, and more.

contact.cta: Request availability & receive a tailored quote
contact.name: Chiara de Miccolis Angelini

metaDescription: Plan your dream Puglian wedding at Masseria Salamina, a stunning 17th-century estate with 20 luxury rooms, 11 event spaces, ancient olive groves, and authentic Italian cuisine. Exclusive use available.
